content: *teens will love the bold colorful stripes used to make this afghan lion brand yarn * video tutorials provided by kim guzman here 1 skill level intermediate level 3 crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm split ring stitch markers vanna s choice® article #860 8 colors 2 balls each 16 balls total lion brand pattern # l20319b 2 aug 22 2014 *navy dusty blue radiant lime radiant yellow white silver blue silver grey charcoal grey* lion brand pattern # l20319 3 oct 12 2012 *cranberry dusty purple pea green kelly green terracotta colonial blue eggplant mustard* gauge 12 sts + 10 row = about 4 in 10 cm in tunisian crochet one block = about 3 in 7 5 cm measured diagonally *lion brand notes * throw is worked in tunisian crochet entrelac a regular crochet hook is used instead of a tunisian hook since only a small number of stitches are held on the hook for each block each entrelac row is worked with one color 1 http //kimguzman com/blog/new-videos-tunisian-crochet-entrelac/ 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/l20319b html 3 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/l20319 html
